verse: रामं रत्नकिरीटकुण्डलयुतं केयूरहारान्वितम् सीतालंकृतवामभागममलं सिंहासनस्थं विभुम् । सुग्रीवादि हरीश्वरैः सुरगणैः संसेव्यमानं सदा विश्वामित्रपराशरादिमुनिभिः संस्तूयमानं भजे
overall_meaning: I worship Rama, adorned with a crown of gems and earrings, adorned with armlets, embellished with Sita on His left side, seated on a lion throne, the Almighty, being served by the lords of monkeys starting with Sugriva and the celestial beings, always praised by sages headed by Vishwamitra and Parashara.
